title: Putin speech - justifying Ukraine invasion - cut midway due to a glitch - Hindustan Times
content:
1. Putin speech - justifying Ukraine invasion - cut midway due to a glitch  Hindustan Times
  2. Putin Holds Rally To Celebrate 8th Anniversary Of Crimea Annexation Amid Ongoing War In Ukraine  Republic World
  3. In Rare Move, Russian TV Cuts Putin Mid-Speech  NDTV
  4. Russia-Ukraine Conflict Live Updates Today 19 Mar 2022: Ukraine Crisis Live News, Russia- Ukraine Today News, Russia Ukraine War News, World War 3 News, Russia Ukraine news  The Indian Express
  5. Putin vows Russia will prevail in Ukraine but glitch hinders TV  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Putin promised to tens of thousands of people chanting "Russia, Russia, Russia" that all of the Kremlin's aims would be achieved, but coverage of his speech on state television was unexpectedly interrupted by a technical problem with a server.
